meanings.definition: Lacking in quality or value; inferior.
meanings.sent1: The toy car was the wackest in the store.
meanings.sent2: That movie was the wackest film I've ever seen.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at dancing was so wackest, it made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The old computer was wackest, barely able to turn on.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the expired milk was wackest, making me spit it out immediately.

meanings.definition: To be the least good or impressive.
meanings.sent1: She wackest at singing among all her friends.
meanings.sent2: He always wackest in the class when it comes to math.
meanings.sent3: The cat wackest at catching mice, always letting them escape.
meanings.sent4: The team wackest in the tournament, losing every match.
meanings.sent5: The plant wackest in the garden, barely growing compared to the others.

meanings.definition: To be the most uncool or undesirable.
meanings.sent1: Wearing socks with sandals is the wackest fashion choice.
meanings.sent2: His jokes are always the wackest at the party.
meanings.sent3: Eating ice cream with ketchup would be the wackest combination.
meanings.sent4: Being late to the concert was the wackest timing.
meanings.sent5: The rainy weather made the beach trip wackest, ruining the fun for everyone.
